cause_of_action: Dispute over damages caused by prohibition application delaying generic drug market entry
evidence_assessment: Ownership of the patent, involvement in prohibition proceedings, and exclusive licensing agreement provided sufficient factual basis for allegations
decision_reasoning: Allegations are not plain and obvious failures and have potential to succeed at trial
procedure_followed: Appeal from Prothonotary's decision refusing to strike Apotex's amended claim against SPIL; reviewed de novo
result_of_case: Court upheld Prothonotary's decision, denied stay of proceedings, and awarded costs to Apotex
